title: Electrical Pulse Stimulation (DRAFT)

References (partial)

Dastmalchi, N., Jafarzadeh, H., & Moradi, S. (2012). Comparison of the efficacy of a custom-made pulse oximeter probe with digital electric pulp tester, cold spray, and rubber cup for assessing pulp vitality. J Endod, 38(9), 1182–1186. doi: 10.1016/j.joen.2012.06.012


Evans, D., Reid, J., Strang, R., & Stirrups, D. (1999). A comparison of laser doppler flowmetry with other methods of assessing the vitality of traumatised anterior teeth. Endod Dent Traumatol, 15(6), 284–290. doi: 10.1111/j.1600-9657.1999.tb00789.x


Farid, H., Khan, F. R., Pasha, L., & Shinwari, M. S. (2015). Are pulp sensibility tests still sensible? J Ayub Med Coll Abbottabad, 27(4), 874–877.


Gopikrishna, V., Tinagupta, K., & Kandaswamy, D. (2007). Evaluation of efficacy of a new custom-made pulse oximeter dental probe in comparison with the electrical and thermal tests for assessing pulp vitality. J Endod, 33(4), 411–414. doi: 10.1016/j.joen.2006.12.003


Ingólfsson, A. R., Tronstad, L., Hersh, E. V., & Riva, C. E. (1994). Efficacy of laser doppler flowmetry in determining pulp vitality of human teeth. Endod Dent Traumatol, 10(2), 83–87. doi: 10.1111/j.1600-9657.1994.tb00065.x


Janani, K., Palanivelu, A., & Sandhya, R. (2020). Diagnostic accuracy of dental pulse oximeter with customized sensor holder, thermal test and electric pulp test for the evaluation of pulp vitality: An in vivo study. Brazilian Dental Science, 23(1), 8–p.


Petersson, K., Söderström, C., Kiani-Anaraki, M., & Lévy, G. (1999). Evaluation of the ability of thermal and electrical tests to register pulp vitality. Endod Dent Traumatol, 15(3), 127–131. doi: 10.1111/j.1600-9657.1999.tb00769.x


Shahi, P., Sood, P. B., Sharma, A., Madan, M., Shahi, N., & Gandhi, G. (2015). Comparative study of pulp vitality in primary and young permanent molars in human children with pulse oximeter and electric pulp tester. Int J Clin Pediatr Dent, 8(2), 94–98. doi: 10.5005/jp-journals-10005-1291


Villa-Chávez, C. E., Patiño-Marı́n, N., Loyola-Rodrı́guez, J. P., Zavala-Alonso, N. V., Martı́nez-Castañón, G. A., & Medina-Solı́s, C. E. (2013). Predictive values of thermal and electrical dental pulp tests: A clinical study. J Endod, 39(8), 965–969. doi: 10.1016/j.joen.2013.04.019


Weisleder, R., Yamauchi, S., Caplan, D. J., Trope, M., & Teixeira, F. B. (2009). The validity of pulp testing: A clinical study. J Am Dent Assoc, 140(8), 1013–1017. doi: 10.14219/jada.archive.2009.0312
